Question: This person did not bounce back from the loss well.
Hints: This person hosted Saturday Night Live with musical guest Carrie Underwood on March 24, 2007, his 31st birthday.
This person and Addai helped the Colts to a 13–7 half-time lead, and an early fourth quarter touchdown upped the lead to 20–10.
This person passed for 333 yards on 31/45, with 1 TD and 1 interception.
